# Workshop materials {#materials}

```{r echo = FALSE}
library("knitr")
knitr::opts_knit$set(root.dir = rprojroot::find_rstudio_root_file())
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE) 
knitr::knit_hooks$set(inline = function(x) {
        if (!is.numeric(x)) { 
                x 
        } else if (x >= 10000) { 
                prettyNum(round(x, 2), big.mark = ",")
        } else {
                prettyNum(round(x, 2))
        }
})
```
